structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.text: The provisions of KRS 411.600 to 411.640 shall apply to all covered claims pending on June 20, 2005, and all claims filed thereafter, regardless of when the claim arose.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 5, effective June 20, 2005.
